description: This tool allows users to verify their version of Microsoft Edge, which is essential after a potential vulnerability is reported. To check the version, users need to open their Microsoft Edge browser and click on the three dots located at the top right corner of the window. From the dropdown menu, they should select 'Help and feedback' and then 'About Microsoft Edge'. This action will display the current version of the browser and confirm whether it is updated to mitigate known vulnerabilities, such as CVE-2023-5997. Ensuring that the browser is up-to-date is a critical step in maintaining security and addressing potential threats.
